input.description: Adapter supporting requests to Remedy REST API

Remedy REST API URL. For example: http(s)://<remedy-host>:<remedy-rest-api-port>
By default, out of the box, Remedy REST API server port is 8008.
http://remedy-server-name:8008
Authorization token received via login to Remedy REST API.
Name of the Remedy form from which entries are retrieved.
Entry ID to be used to retrieve data. If none provided all entries are retrieved.
Return data in JSON or XML format. Possible values are json and xml. Default value is json.

A number like: 50
Offsets the result by 50 entries

A number like 10.
Gets no more than 10 entries

Like: Status.asc,Create Date.desc
Sorts first by Status in ascending order and then by Create Date in descending order.

Like: expand=assoc(association1) Retrieves data related an entry with respect to association1
expand=assoc(association1) & assoc(association2) Retrieves data related an entry with respect to association1 and association2.

output.description: HTTP response headers in XML or JSON format based on return data format.
REST response body in XML or JSON format based on return data format.
